entry.title: Python Approach to Quantum Computing - Cirq Framework and More – PyCon Taiwan 2020
entry.summary:
Description

Day 2, 14:30–15:00

This talk will share several python approaches to the thriving field, quantum computing and quantum information. In this talk, Cirq python framework, which is an open source project announced by Google, will be mainly used as examples.

Slides: https://bit.ly/35cOeeR

Speaker …
entry.content:
Description

Day 2, 14:30–15:00

This talk will share several python approaches to the thriving field, quantum computing and quantum information. In this talk, Cirq python framework, which is an open source project announced by Google, will be mainly used as examples.

Slides: https://bit.ly/35cOeeR

Speaker: 何泰祥 Taihsiang Ho (tai271828)

Canonical Software Engineer. FLOSS contributor. Scientific computing amateur. Climber, pianist and cellist.
